definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: Tourism industry is not the genuine "smokeless industry".
sentences.chinese: 旅游业并非真正意义上的“无烟工业”。

sentences.english: Asking them if they prefer smoking or non-smoking table.
sentences.chinese: 并询问客人需要坐吸烟区还是无烟区。

sentences.english: Made from smokeless fire, Djinn are capable of changing shape at will.
sentences.chinese: 巨灵由无烟之火创造而成，能够随意变换形状。

sentences.english: Certainly. Would you like to sit somking area or no somking area ?
sentences.chinese: 当然可以。您喜欢坐吸烟区还是无烟区呢？

sentences.english: We should have a non-smoking office.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该有一个无烟办公室。

sentences.english: I think the time has come for Montoni's to go smoke-free.
sentences.chinese: 我想该是蒙托尼成为无烟餐馆的时候了。

sentences.english: The floor covering is an anthracite needle felt.
sentences.chinese: 地板覆盖是无烟煤针感觉。

sentences.english: No, I'm afraid I need a non-smoking room.
sentences.chinese: 不，生怕我需要一个无烟房间。

sentences.english: World No Tobacco Day is celebrated each thirty-first of May.
sentences.chinese: 世界无烟日是庆祝每年5月第三十一届。

sentences.english: World No Tobacco Day is celebrated around the world on May 31.
sentences.chinese: 5月31日将在世界各地庆祝世界无烟日。

sentences.english: The organic affinity of trace elements decreases further in anthracite.
sentences.chinese: 到无烟煤阶段，有机态微量元素含量进一步降低。

sentences.english: How can they make a difference and work for a tobacco-free world?
sentences.chinese: 它们可怎样起作用和为实现一个无烟世界而努力？
阿姆斯特丹的无烟咖啡店？

sentences.english: Only 100% smoke-free environments provide effective protection.
sentences.chinese: 只有100%的无烟环境可提供有效的保护。

sentences.english: Acquisitions have been the preferred means of entry to the smokeless market.
sentences.chinese: 收购已经成为进入无烟烟草市场的首选手段。

sentences.english: The Company maintains a smoke- and tobacco-free office.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司保持着无烟的办公环境。

definition: to ignite/to light a fire/to agitate/to start an engine/ignition/fig. to stir up trouble
to burn/to ignite/to light/fig. to spark off (hopes)/to start (debate)/to raise (hopes)
